dependencies.package: MobileSubstrate, PreferenceLoader, libCSPreferences, libCSColorpicker, at least iOS 10

descriptionlist.description: Organize and sort notifications on the LS and NC. This is still a work in progress, I hope you guys enjoy. :).

screenshot.description: Don't mind the female as the screenshot. She's my bestfriend.

changelog.change: Fixed compatibility issues. Will fix when I get to work on an update for iOS 11.
